name: Disaster Drive
description:
How many points can YOU collect before exploding into a fireball of automotive carnage? You've got 10 seconds to drive an old pickup truck around the corners before reaching the next checkpoint. Use nitro boost to blast down the road while collecting 10X more points! Can you beat the HI SCORE?

The first ever Disaster Drive playtest has come to an end. Your Participation in the development process is helping to improve this game. Get notified about future steam playtests by visiting the official website.

Playtest Features

  • Endless Mode with procedurally generated roads for marathon gameplay
  • Nitro Boost score multiplier
  • Drift cornering
  • HI SCORE system
